Plot: A documentary surveying the various Hollywood screen depictions of homosexuals and the attitudes behind them throughout the history of North American film.
Title: The Celluloid Closet
Writer: Vito Russo (book), Rob Epstein (story), Jeffrey Friedman (story), Sharon Wood (story), Armistead Maupin (narration)
Actors: Lily Tomlin, Tony Curtis, Susie Bright, Arthur Laurents
Awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 7 wins & 4 nominations.
